                                                 nl.weeaboo.common.Area2D uv)
        Returns a sub-rectangle of the given base UV area
        Parameters:
        baseUV - The base UV rectangle.
        uv - The relative sub-rectangle within the base UV area.

      • interpolateColors

        public static int interpolateColors(int c0,
                                    int c1,
                                    float w)
        Performs linear interpolation between two colors.
        Parameters:
        w - Determines the relative weight of each color, where 0.0 returns c0 and 1.0 returns c1.

      • premultiplyAlpha

        public static int premultiplyAlpha(int argb)
        Multiplies the RGB color components with the alpha, resulting in so-called premuliplied alpha.

        Note that this operation is lossy due to rounding.

      • unPremultiplyAlpha

        public static int unPremultiplyAlpha(int argb)
        Performs the opposite operation of premultiplyAlpha(int).

        Note that these operations are lossy due to rounding errors.

      • argb2rgba

        public static int argb2rgba(int argb)
        Converts AARRGGBB to RRGGBBAA.

      • rgba2argb

        public static int rgba2argb(int rgba)
        Converts RRGGBBAA to AARRGGBB.

      • packRGBAtoARGB

        public static int packRGBAtoARGB(double r,
                                 double g,
                                 double b,
                                 double a)
        Packs separate R,G,B,A doubles in the range [0, 1] into a single AARRGGBB int.
